mobs.LongDesc: The Captain of the Mercenaries is here, growling ferally at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Snarling in his madness, the Captain of the Mercenaries looks up from
his half-eaten fido.  You see that he is in the last stages of radiation
sickness, but he moves like a drug-crazed killer: quickly and with a savage
strength.  He seems to pause, as if trying to decide what to do.

mobs.LongDesc: A mutated mercenary is here, willing to work for anything.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He looks something like a nightmare you had last night.  He has very little
hair, even less teeth, and the skin is oozing off his body in several
different places.  You don't think you want to stick your valuable weapons
into these remains of what used to be an elite killer for hire.

mobs.LongDesc: A glowing beastly fido is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Larger, and more deadly looking than it's pre-war counterparts, this fido
looks at you with intimidatingly intelligent eyes.  It's fur is thick and
bristly, and it's eyes glow with a luminescent green hue.  As you look at
it, a tongue lolls out of its mouth, revealing dual rows of pointed teeth
the size of carpenter's nails.  This is definitely not a normal dog...

mobs.LongDesc: A glowing white frigid fido is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Larger, and more deadly looking than it's pre-war counterpart, this fido
looks as if it is carved out of a block of blue-white ice.  It's eyes seem
unusually intelligent, and they glow with a luminescent blue hue.  As you
look at it, it exhales a puff of vapor that seems even colder than the air
around you.  Even for the mutated fidos, this one is very strange...

mobs.LongDesc: A transparent beastly fido is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Larger, and more deadly looking than it's pre-war counterparts, this fido
looks at you with intimidatingly intelligent eyes.  It's fur is thick and
bristly, and it's eyes glow with a luminescent green hue.  As you look at
it, a tongue lolls out of its mouth, revealing dual rows of pointed teeth
the size of carpenter's nails.  This is definitely not a normal dog...

mobs.LongDesc: A sneaky glowing beastly fido is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Larger, and more deadly looking than it's pre-war counterparts, this fido
looks at you with intimidatingly intelligent eyes.  It's fur is thick and
bristly, and it's eyes glow with a luminescent green hue.  As you look at
it, a tongue lolls out of its mouth, revealing dual rows of pointed teeth
the size of carpenter's nails.  This is definitely not a normal dog...

mobs.LongDesc: A mutated mercenary is here, willing to work for anything.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He looks something like a nightmare you had last night.  He has very little
hair, even less teeth, and the skin is oozing off his body in several
different places.  You don't think you want to stick your valuable weapons
into these remains of what used to be an elite killer for hire.

mobs.LongDesc: A gaunt, sickly janitor is here, still trying to clean up.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
It appears the janitors are more closely related to cockroaches than was
previously thought, as this one seems to have survived.  He ignores your
gaze completely as he vainly attempts to do his job.  Unfortunately for him,
the bodies seem to be moving, at least they seem to be moving to him...

mobs.LongDesc: A glowing white frigid fido is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Larger, and more deadly looking than it's pre-war counterpart, this fido
looks as if it is carved out of a block of blue-white ice.  It's eyes seem
unusually intelligent, and they glow with a luminescent blue hue.  As you
look at it, it exhales a puff of vapor that seems even colder than the air
around you.  Even for the mutated fidos, this one is very strange...

mobs.LongDesc: A skeleton is here, its empty skull grinning at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is the long-dead remains of one of the inhabitants of Midgaard.  As you
study it, you notice a slight tremor begin to vibrate the bones of it's legs,
and as you watch, it begins to move towards you, clawing the air hungrily.

mobs.LongDesc: A skeleton is here, its empty skull grinning at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is the long-dead remains of one of the inhabitants of Midgaard.  As you
study it, you notice a slight tremor begin to vibrate the bones of it's legs,
and as you watch, it begins to move towards you, clawing the air hungrily.

mobs.LongDesc: A street peddler is here selling junk.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
As you look at the filthy peddler your first urge is to turn and puke.  He
has to be one of the filthiest things you have ever seen.  His clothes are
torn and patched so badly that you couldn't guess at their origional colour
even if they were clean.  The rest of him doesn't look that good.  You try 
to keep downwind of him as much as possible.

mobs.LongDesc: A human-looking cockroach stands here on two legs.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This has to be the most unusual creature you have ever seen.  It looks like
you average cockroach, but it is as big as a man, and stands on it's legs
and uses it's arms like a man.  Whether it was a cockroach or a man before
the war, you cannot tell.  You decide that this place isn't all that safe
for you.

mobs.LongDesc: The Mage Guildmaster is here, staring coldly at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The guildmaster looks older and more tired, but otherwise appears to have
been unaffected by the war.  He is wearing fine magic clothing, and you notice
a faint blue aura surrounding his body.  He is muttering unintelligible
phrases under his breath, and you think he would just as soon turn you into a
toad as not if he noticed you here.

mobs.LongDesc: The Guildmaster of Thieves is here, looking worn and wary.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Even though the Guildmaster of Thieves looks formidable, you can see that
only his power has allowed him to survive this long.  His eyes are very
bloodshot, and his skin has an unhealthy pallor to it.  But he still looks
strong enough to take on anything.

mobs.LongDesc: The High Clericist, Guildmaster of Odin is here, weeping.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Dressed in the remains of his once beautiful clerical robes, this old man
looks less like like a guildmaster, and more like a sad, tired old man.
Regardless of that, his aura of power is undiminished, and he still looks
very strong.  You reason that, if he's lasted this long, here, in this gods
forsaken place, he must have some power left.

mobs.LongDesc: The Guild Master-at-Arms is here, hands resting on his broadsword.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This great knight is dressed in a magnificent suit of armor which is now
scarred by countless battles and covered in blood.  You look into his eyes
and see firm resolution to defend the guild to the death.  You don't think
it would be wise to trouble him by asking him to teach a weakling like you.

mobs.LongDesc: The Guildmaster of Paladins stands here, trying to shine his armor.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Trying to look as if nothing was amiss, the Guildmaster for the Paladins
is here, vainly trying to scour the pits and crevaces in his armor that were
caused by the radioactive fallout.  He's not having much sucess, but that
hasn't stopped him from trying.  He barely acknowledges you as you enter
and look him over.  He returns immediately to his polishing attempts.

mobs.LongDesc: The inventor is here, tinkering on a gadget
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The inventor is fairly small but incredibly skilled with his hands.  He is
completely bald and wears a pair of silver spectacles.  For a small fee, 
he will allow you to enter his time machine and visit the future.

mobs.LongDesc: The Mayor of Midgaard stands here, crying over his city
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Mayor of Midaard managed to survive the holocaust somehow.  His
clothes and overall appearance would suggest that he is not living 
the comfortable life he was used to.  He is filthy like the rest of
what is left of his city, but he seems to be in much better shape than
he used to be.

mobs.LongDesc: Gambit stands here, mourning the loss of everything he has fought for.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Gambit appears to have given up all hope of life.  The radiation has
destroyed the powers he used to have, and reduced him to a mere shadow
of the man he used to be.

mobs.LongDesc: The Vampire Lord stands here, as dark as he ever was.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You look at the Vampire Lord and notice he is in excellent shape.
He must be one of the few that actually profited from the holocaust.
You go to turn away, but his eyes catch yours, and hold them for a
long time.  Then all of a sudden he flashes a smile at you with sharp,
pointy teeth, and the spell is broken.

mobs.LongDesc: Mahn Tor is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Mahn Tor was once the leader of the minotaurs that dwelled in the
keep west of Midgaard.  He is the last of his kind, all of his
brethren having been killed by the holocaust.  He will fight to the 
death to keep the species alive.

mobs.LongDesc: Eric Draven stands here, trapped between worlds.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Eric Draven looks very much like the spirit he is.  He is still
wearing his face paint and dark clothing, and has his guitar slung
across his back.  Having avenged Shelly's death he now wanders the
lands looking to be reunited with his love.

mobs.LongDesc: Jupiter is here, wondering how his fellow gods could have done this.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Jupiter was once the strongest of the Roman gods.  The only one
of those immortal beings to survive the holocaust, he now wanders
the wastelands, lost and lonely.

mobs.LongDesc: King Welmar is here, looking for his bodyguards.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Once the leader of a proud kingdom, King Welmar has lost everything.
His face shows only  sadness at the  loss, and a firm resolution to
avenge the destruction of his realm.

mobs.LongDesc: Hercules stands here looking for another quest.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Hercules looks as impressive as ever.  The mortal man deemed good
enough to be admitted to the ranks of the gods appears to have survived
the very gods that gave him that status.

mobs.LongDesc: A glowing beastly fido is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Larger, and more deadly looking than it's pre-war counterparts, this fido
looks at you with intimidatingly intelligent eyes.  It's fur is thick and
bristly, and it's eyes glow with a luminescent green hue.  As you look at
it, a tongue lolls out of its mouth, revealing dual rows of pointed teeth
the size of carpenter's nails.  This is definitely not a normal dog...

mobs.LongDesc: The Glass Monster sits here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You look at this impossible being and see nothing but a pile of molten
glass formed in a vague man like shape.

mobs.LongDesc: A barmaid is here ready to get you whatever you need.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You look at what has to be one of the most stunning women you have ever seen.
She is wearing a long strapless black dress, with a long slit up the side
revealing most of her long legs.  Her legs are well musculed from getting
people like yourself more to drink.
